name: Tony Stark
description: A genius billionaire who built a high-tech armored suit to become Iron Man. Founder of Stark Industries and a core member of the Avengers.

name: Steve Rogers
description: A World War II hero transformed by the Super Soldier Serum, Captain America leads with honor and bravery.

name: Thor Odinson
description: The Norse God of Thunder from Asgard, wielding the magical hammer Mjolnir and later Stormbreaker.

name: Bruce Banner
description: After a gamma radiation accident, Bruce Banner transforms into the Hulk â€” a nearly unstoppable force of rage and power.

name: Natasha Romanoff
description: A master spy and hand-to-hand combat expert with a dark past. Trained in espionage and martial arts.

name: Clint Barton
description: A skilled archer and marksman with unmatched precision. A loyal and strategic team player.

name: Wanda Maximoff
description: A powerful sorceress capable of manipulating chaos magic and reality itself.

name: Vision
description: An android with the power of the Mind Stone, created from Vibranium and synthetic material.

name: Peter Parker
description: A teenage superhero with spider-like abilities, mentored by Tony Stark.

name: Stephen Strange
description: A former surgeon turned Master of the Mystic Arts. Protects the multiverse with magic.
